title: Drawing, "View of Lake Konigssee from the Malerwinkel, near Berchtesgaden, Bavaria, Germany, Part 1", July 11, 1868
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Konigssee / July 11th 68 / 2- parts
description: Horizontal view of Lake Konigssee from the Malerwinkel with steep surrounding mountain slopes and patches of snow.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "View of Lake Konigssee from the Malerwinkel, near Berchtesgaden, Bavaria, Germany, Part 1", July 11, 1868.
July 11, 1868. Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-563-a.
